title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Learn to build robust web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. This course covers both front-end and back-end development. By the end of this course, you'll have the skills to create and deploy full-stack web applications.
content: Project: Building a Full Stack Application

title: JavaScript Essentials
description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript, the most popular programming language for web development. This course covers everything from basic syntax to advanced concepts. You'll learn how to manipulate the DOM, handle events, and make asynchronous requests.

title: React for Beginners
description: Get started with React, a powerful library for building user interfaces. This course is perfect for beginners and covers the basics of React development. You'll learn about components, state management, and how to build interactive web applications.

title: Python for Web Development
description: Learn how to use Python for web development with popular frameworks like Django and Flask. This course covers the basics of both frameworks and how to build web applications. You'll gain practical skills in setting up servers, managing databases, and deploying applications.
content: API Development with Django REST Framework

title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
description: Understand the building blocks of the web with this comprehensive course on HTML and CSS. Learn how to create and style web pages from scratch. You'll explore responsive design techniques and best practices for creating accessible and user-friendly websites.

title: Node.js Masterclass
description: Become proficient in server-side development with Node.js. This course covers everything from setting up your environment to building and deploying web applications. You'll learn about Node.js fundamentals, express framework, and how to work with databases.

title: Advanced CSS and Sass
description: Enhance your CSS skills by learning advanced techniques and the power of Sass. This course covers modern CSS features, pre-processing with Sass, and best practices for efficient styling.
content: Project: Building a Styled Web Page

title: Angular Crash Course
description: Dive into Angular, a powerful framework for building web applications. This course covers the basics of Angular, including components, directives, services, and routing. You'll learn how to build dynamic and responsive web applications.

title: Vue.js Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. This course covers Vue.js essentials, including components, directives, and state management with Vuex.

title: PHP and MySQL Web Development
description: Learn how to build dynamic websites and web applications using PHP and MySQL. This course covers server-side scripting with PHP and database management with MySQL.
content: Project: Building a PHP and MySQL Application
